system.name: Example AI Assistant
system.intended_use: Drafting and summarization under explicit governance modules.
system.notes: This is a sample dossier used to demonstrate NIST AI RMF coverage checking.

rmf.GOVERN: Decision rights, Pause protocol, governance log, incident response ownership, and AI partnership traceability.
rmf.MAP: Context + stakeholders + potential harms (technical, psychological, economic, systemic) with an equity lens.
rmf.MEASURE: Evaluation plan: accuracy, robustness, red-team, disaggregated error rates where feasible/ethical.
rmf.MANAGE: Mitigations + monitoring + change management + rollback criteria + communications plan.
